webmin

Feb 25, 2020

Overview

Run shell commands from web browser

Try thr live demo hosted on heroku https://shell-webui.herokuapp.com

Requirements

  • Node.js

Get started with node.js https://micrometre.co.uk/micrometreuk-articles/2020/02/06/nodejs.html

Clone the repo and use the make file to get started.

git clone git@github.com:micrometreuk/webmin.git
cd wbmin
npm run start
#to watch file hanges and live reload with nodemon, install it globally
npm instal nodemon -g
npm run test

Requirements

  • Docker and Docker Compose

Get started with Docker https://micrometre.co.uk/2020/02/06/docker.html


``` bash
make start_docker               #Start the container
mae update_docker               #Update/upgarde container

Access using

http://localhost:9091
